Generate a dump of annotated V/J segment sequences. This dump is used by CDRFixer to annotate cases when V/J is not supplied

```{r}
fread("../database/vdjdb.slim.txt") %>%
  as.data.frame %>%
  get_segment_parts %>%
  fwrite("../res/segments.aaparts.txt", sep = "\t")
```
